body: FUCK I CAN'T UNSEE WHAT I HAVE JUST SEEN, FUCK YOU MOTHERFUCKER FOR TAINTING MY FAVORITE SHOW FATE/STAY NIGHT WITH SHIT. No, seriously, fuck you motherfucker artist, die choking while you are eating that piece of shit. Alright, aside from venting, the most well-drawn among the four girls here is Rider, maybe because the eyes are covered and that makes it easier. At last, again, FUCK THIS SHIT, FUCK IMMA WASH MY EYES NAO.
I never expected to find scat fate stay night wow... good job
what kind of sorcery is this?
